original_text:
He wraps up the waters in his clouds,
    yet the clouds do not burst under their weight.
korean_text: 물을 빽빽한 구름에 싸시나 그 밑의 구름이 찢어지지 아니하느니라

sentences.original_text: He wraps up the waters in his clouds
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 구름 속에 물을 감싸 담고

sentences.original_text: yet the clouds do not burst
